New notice from the Ho Chi Minh City Tax Department,
beneficiaries of the
30-minute land tax reduction support policy in 2023

will not be eligible.
Previously, the city tax department

2023 for land tenants who do not

from previous years.  202

of law on land rent, the
30-minute reduction in land rent is calculated on the
amount of land rent payable, if any, after being
reduced or deducted according to the
provisions of the Law.

oil and gas retail stores across the country

and connect data with tax authorities. Up to

a 25-year-old girl became the first person
in the world to drive an electric car
around the world.  crossed the finish line in France

Lexy al4 from Miami USA completed a
30,000 km road through 27 countries
using territories on six continents.
A4's journey ended after about 200
days.  I understand a lot about

to solar panels. I hope From

encountered a number of challenges along the way

Ladies and gentlemen, after many days of focusing on
responding to oil spills, all 7,000 liters of
oil from the transport ship that crashed in
Hoi An Island, Quang Nam, were pumped to the
response center.  Deputy Head of Vietnam Environmental Incident
in the Central region confirmed the
above information, noting that the ship was almost
completely submerged in the sea, the hull was broken in half due to
hitting a reef, all the oil
was sucked out to help prevent the collapse.  The
oil field affected the waters of the
world's biosphere reserve Cu Lao Cham. In addition to the
7,000 liters of oil that had been processed, the
authorities said the nearly 3,000 tons of cement
on the ship had no risk of causing
environmental pollution before.  As the 60

the stamp is  One of the

said that 800,000 copies of this stamp will
be sold to the public from April 5.
Updated information this afternoon, the
fire prevention and fighting force of Khanh
Hoa province has successfully controlled the incident.  Fire broke out in a
specialized tank truck at the liquefied gas market on
Khanh Le Pass. The fire broke out
around 10:00 a.m.
This morning, the tank truck was driven by driver Phan Van Vinh residing
in An Khe town, Gia Lai province,
carrying five tons of liquid gas.  traveling
towards Da Lat, Nha Trang, when reaching
Khanh Le pass, Khanh Vinh district, when they
encountered an accident, a fire broke out in the
liquid gas tank area. The driver
pulled the car over to the side of the road and
disassembled the tractor.  moved away from the
scene and received news from Khanh Vinh district police.
Immediately blocked the scene
and organized a blockade to prevent
vehicles from moving through the
area until 12:15 on the same day the
fire was extinguished.  Completely turned off the
vehicle part 12 The vehicle class in the
liquid gas tank area was burned down, but the entire
tank containing 5 tons of liquid gas is still
